languages.text: "Я не знаю зачем, но тот еретик оболгал нас с головы до пят! Посудите сами, как можно верить слову мутанта? Помыслы нечистых столь же извращены и отвратительны, как и их тела!"

traits.locale_text: "Я не знаю зачем, но тот еретик оболгал нас с головы до пят! Посудите сами, как можно верить слову мутанта? Помыслы нечистых столь ж извращены и отвратительны, как и их тела!"

languages.text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"
languages.original_text: "Я не знаю зачем, но тот еретик оболгал нас с головы до пят! Посудите сами, как можно верить слову мутанта? Помыслы нечистых столь же извращены и отвратительны, как и их тела!"

"I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"

languages.text: « J'ignore pourquoi, mais votre hérétique vous a servi un tissu de mensonges à notre propos ! Qu'est-ce qui vous a pris de croire la parole d'un mutant ? Leurs pensées sont aussi impures et nauséabondes que leurs corps contrefaits ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ignore pourquoi, mais votre hérétique vous a servi un tissu de mensonges à notre propos ! Qu'est-ce qui vous a pris de croire la parole d'un mutant ? Leurs pensées sont aussi impures et nauséabondes que leurs corps contrefaits ! »

languages.text: «No sabría decirle por qué, ¡pero ese hereje del que habla solo nos ha calumniado! ¿Qué mosca le ha picado a mil{mf|ord|ady} para confiar en lo que tenga que decir un mutante? ¡Lo único más sucio y repugnante que sus mentes son sus cuerpos!».
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"

traits.locale_text: «No sabría decirle por qué, ¡pero ese hereje del que habla solo nos ha calumniado! ¿Qué mosca le ha picado a mil{mf|ord|ady} para confiar en lo que tenga que decir un mutante? ¡Lo único más sucio y repugnante que sus mentes son sus cuerpos!».

languages.text: 「なぜかは想像もつきませんが、この異端者は、私たちを頭のてっぺんからつま先まで徹底的に中傷しました！陛下が変異体の言葉を信用するとは何事ですか？彼らの思考は、その肉体と同様に汚らわしく、醜悪です！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜかは想像もつきませんが、この異端者は、私たちを頭のてっぺんからつま先まで徹底的に中傷しました！陛下が変異体の言葉を信用するとは何事ですか？彼らの思考は、その肉体と同様に汚らわしく、醜悪です！」

languages.text: “我根本不明白这是怎么回事，那个异端分子完全就是在污蔑我们！大人，您究竟是中了什么邪，怎么会相信一个变种人的话？他们的思想就像他们的身体一样肮脏、令人作呕！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"

traits.locale_text: “我根本不明白这是怎么回事，那个异端分子完全就是在污蔑我们！大人，您究竟是中了什么邪，怎么会相信一个变种人的话？他们的思想就像他们的身体一样肮脏、令人作呕！”

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht warum, aber dieser Ketzer hat uns alle in falschen Verdacht gebracht. Was hat Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nur dazu bewogen, einem Mutanten zu glauben? Ihre Gedanken sind so unrein und widerlich wie ihre Körper!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht warum, aber dieser Ketzer hat uns alle in falschen Verdacht gebracht. Was hat Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nur dazu bewogen, einem Mutanten zu glauben? Ihre Gedanken sind so unrein und widerlich wie ihre Körper!"

languages.text: "Nedenini hayal dahi edemiyorum ama bahsettiğiniz kâfir, bizi tepeden tırnağa iftiraya boğmuş! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni bir mutantın sözüne güvenecek kadar yoldan çıkaran nedir? Onların düşünceleri, tıpkı bedenleri gibi günahkâr ve tiksindiricidir!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine why, but this heretic of yours slandered us from head to toe! Whatever possessed Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to trust the word of a mutant? Their thoughts are as unclean and disgusting as their bodies!"
